name: Sea of memories
description: Optical illusions reach Virtual Reality! Challenge your mind rotating the pieces to clean up the chaos.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
